author: Staff Reporter
text:
Upset with Desiya Murpokku Dravida Kazhagam (DMDK) president Vijaykant entering into an alliance with People’s Welfare Front (PWF), DMDK’s Pallipalayam urban district secretary R. Selvaraj along with over 100 supporters joined the AIADMK here on Wednesday evening.

Mr. Selvaraj along with deputy secretary A. Premkumar and Youth Wing secretary R. Satheeshkumar joined the AIADMK in the presence of Minister for Industries and Transport P. Thangamani in Pallipalayam.

However, DMDK party sources said that it was going to have little impact in the elections.
title: Over 100 DMDK cadre join AIADMK
